trans-unit.source: Integration Using REST API

seg-source.mrk: Integration Using REST API

target.mrk: Intégration avec l'API REST

trans-unit.source: This topic describes the REST (Representational State Transfer) API provided by Atempo that you can use to perform some <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />operations in your production environment.

seg-source.mrk: This topic describes the REST (Representational State Transfer) API provided by Atempo that you can use to perform some <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />operations in your production environment.

target.mrk: Cette rubrique décrit l'API REST (Representational State Transfer) fournie par Atempo que vous pouvez utiliser pour effectuer certaines opérations <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> dans votre environnement de production.

trans-unit.source: The information in this topic is intended for developers who are familiar with REST API.

seg-source.mrk: The information in this topic is intended for developers who are familiar with REST API.

target.mrk: Les informations contenues dans cette rubrique sont destinées aux développeurs qui sont familiarisés avec l'API REST.

trans-unit.source: Overview

seg-source.mrk: Overview

target.mrk: Vue d'ensemble

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> objects and functions are exposed through a comprehensive REST API. This API can be used to create custom interfaces or automate operations.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> objects and functions are exposed through a comprehensive REST API.
This API can be used to create custom interfaces or automate operations.

target.mrk: Les objets et les fonctions <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sont exposés via une API REST complète.
Cette API peut être utilisée pour créer des interfaces personnalisées ou automatiser des opérations.

trans-unit.source: REST API URLs

seg-source.mrk: REST API URLs

target.mrk: URL de l'API REST

trans-unit.source: Atempo <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> REST API is available on HTTP and/or HTTPS, depending on your configuration.

seg-source.mrk: Atempo <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> REST API is available on HTTP and/or HTTPS, depending on your configuration.

target.mrk: L'API REST <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> d'Atempo est disponible sur HTTP et/ou HTTPS, en fonction de votre configuration.

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, Atempo recommends to use REST API through the HTTPS protocol.

seg-source.mrk: For security reasons, Atempo recommends to use REST API through the HTTPS protocol.

target.mrk: Pour des raisons de sécurité, Atempo recommande d'utiliser l'API REST via le protocole HTTPS.

trans-unit.source: Access the API Documentation, Using a Hyperlink

seg-source.mrk: Access the API Documentation, Using a Hyperlink

target.mrk: Accéder à la documentation de l'API en utilisant un hyperlien

trans-unit.source: Open a web browser and go to: https://:8181/api/

seg-source.mrk: Open a web browser and go to: https://:8181/api/

target.mrk: Ouvrez un navigateur web et allez sur https://:8181/api/

trans-unit.source: is the network name of your server and 8181 is the port used to access the Administration interface.

seg-source.mrk: is the network name of your server and 8181 is the port used to access the Administration interface.

target.mrk: est le nom de réseau de votre serveur et 8181 est le port utilisé pour accéder à l'interface d'administration.

trans-unit.source: Access the API Documentation, Using the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Access the API Documentation, Using the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Accéder à la documentation de l'API via la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: Log into the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Log into the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Connectez-vous à la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: In the upper right corner of the dashboard, select the button. A pop-up dialog displays.

seg-source.mrk: In the upper right corner of the dashboard, select the button.
A pop-up dialog displays.

target.mrk: Dans le coin supérieur droit du tableau de bord, sélectionnez le bouton .
Une pop-up s'affiche.

trans-unit.source: In the pop-up window, select API documentation. The API documentation displays in a separate tab.

seg-source.mrk: In the pop-up window, select API documentation.
The API documentation displays in a separate tab.

target.mrk: Dans la pop-up, sélectionnez Documentation API.
La documentation de l'API s'ouvre dans un onglet distinct.

trans-unit.source: Add an API Key

seg-source.mrk: Add an API Key

target.mrk: Ajouter une clé API

trans-unit.source: An API key is a string of characters used to run scripts into the Environment Command Prompt. An API key must be associated to a user so the user can run scripts.

seg-source.mrk: An API key is a string of characters used to run scripts into the Environment Command Prompt.
An API key must be associated to a user so the user can run scripts.

target.mrk: Une clé API est une chaîne de caractères utilisée pour exécuter des scripts dans le mode commande.
Une clé API doit être associée à un utilisateur afin que l'utilisateur puisse exécuter des scripts.

trans-unit.source: Go to Server > Users.

seg-source.mrk: Go to Server > Users.

target.mrk: Allez dans Serveur > Utilisateurs.

trans-unit.source: In the list of users, click a user.

seg-source.mrk: In the list of users, click a user.

target.mrk: Dans la liste des utilisateurs, cliquez sur un utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: In the user details, click API keys.

seg-source.mrk: In the user details, click API keys.

target.mrk: Dans la fiche utilisateur, cliquez sur Clés API.

trans-unit.source: Define an expiration date for the new API key:

seg-source.mrk: Define an expiration date for the new API key:

target.mrk: Définissez une date d'expiration pour la nouvelle clé API :

trans-unit.source: Unlimited: The token has no expiration date.

seg-source.mrk: Unlimited: The token has no expiration date.

target.mrk: Illimité : le jeton n'a pas de date d'expiration.

trans-unit.source: Limited with a date: The token has an expiration date and time.

seg-source.mrk: Limited with a date: The token has an expiration date and time.

target.mrk: Limité avec une date : le jeton a une date et une heure d'expiration.

trans-unit.source: Limited with a validity period: The token can be valid for a day, a week, a month, 3 months, 6 months or a year.

seg-source.mrk: Limited with a validity period: The token can be valid for a day, a week, a month, 3 months, 6 months or a year.

target.mrk: Limité avec une période de validité : le jeton peut être valide pour un jour, une semaine, un mois, 3 mois, 6 mois ou une année.

trans-unit.source: Click Add an API key.

seg-source.mrk: Click Add an API key.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Ajouter une clé API.

trans-unit.source: A string of characters displays under the button. To copy the API key, click the icon. To delete an existing API key, click the cross besides the icon.

seg-source.mrk: A string of characters displays under the button.
To copy the API key, click the icon.
To delete an existing API key, click the cross besides the icon.

target.mrk: Une chaîne de caractères s'affiche sous le bouton.
Pour copier la clé API, cliquez sur l'icône .
Pour supprimer une clé API existante, cliquez sur la croix à côté de l'icône .
